page.title: 14STICKS -A GAMES FOR BOYS
page.content: WE PLAY A GAME CALLED STICKS. TO PLAY IT YOU NEED 3 STICKS , TWO ABOUT 10CM TALL AND ONE 5CM. PLACE THE TWO BIGGEST STICKS AGAINST THE WALL, THEN YOU BALANCE THE SHORTER STICK ON THE TWO TALLER STICKS. WHEN YOU HAVE DONE THAT YOU PUT THE PEOPLE IN TWO DIFFERENT TEAMS. ONE TEAMS FIELDS AND THE OTHER TEAM BOWLS. EACH PERSON IN THE BOWLING TEAM THROWS A BALL AT THE STICKS. IF IT HITS THE FLOOR AND THEN THE WALL AND SOMEONE IN THE FIELDING TEAM CATCHES IT THEY ARE OUT, BUT IF IT HITS THE WALL FIRST NOTHING HAPPENS. IF YOU KNOCK DOWN THE STICKS YOUR TEAM MUST PUT THEM UP WITHOUT BEING HIT BY THE BALL BECAUSE THE OTHER TEAM THROWS THE BALL AT YOU. IF YOU GET HIT YOU ARE OUT, WHEN THE WHOLE TEAM ARE OUT YOU SWAP ROUND AND DO THE SAME.
